@ deffjam555

There are 2 ways :-

Easy way :-

Search for a torrent with same name who has uploaded the image in its torrent. 
Right Click on image. 
Click on save as & copy the code instead of image. 
Put this Bayimg code in your Torrent

Normal way :-

Search for image on Net
Resize it to below 200x300 size(Also below 20 kb size).
Upload it on bayimage 
Put the bayimage code on ur torrent
